com.polarion.alm.builder

Interface IWritableRepository

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IBuildInformationRepository, IReportsRepository

    public interface IWritableRepository
    Write operations for simple structured repository.
    Version:
    $Revision: 820961 $ $Date: 2016-06-09 18:23:58 +0200 (Thu, 09 Jun 2016) $
    Author:
    Stepan Roh, Polarion Software
    See Also:
    IReadableRepository, ILocallySynchronizableRepository

    • Method Detail

      • writeFile

        void writeFile(ILocation location,
               java.io.InputStream data)
        throws java.io.IOException
        Stores data in given file.

        Will make parent folders if needed.

        Parameters:
        location - location
        data - data
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if location is null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if data is null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if location is relative
        java.io.IOException - if error occurs or location is not file

      • makeFolder

        void makeFolder(ILocation location)
         throws java.io.IOException
        Makes folder on given location.

        Will make parent folders if needed.

        It is OK to request making of folder which already exists.

        Parameters:
        location - location
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if location is null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if location is relative
        java.io.IOException - if error occurs or some folder can not be created

      • removeLocation

        void removeLocation(ILocation location)
             throws java.io.IOException
        Removes location (being it plain file or folder).

        Will remove folder contents if needed.

        It is permitted to remove location which does not exist.

        Parameters:
        location - location
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if location is null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if location is relative
        java.io.IOException - if error occurs

      • copyFromLocalFile

        void copyFromLocalFile(java.io.File file,
                       ILocation location)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Copies file or directory to given location.

        If given file is real file then file data are written into given location.

        If given file is directory then makeFolder(ILocation) is called on given location and directory contents are (recursively) copied under it.

        Note that last modification time of target resources will mirror those of source.

        Parameters:
        file - file or directory to copy from
        location - destination location
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if file is null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if file does not exist
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if location is null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if location is relative
        java.io.IOException - if error occurs

      • moveFromLocalFile

        void moveFromLocalFile(java.io.File file,
                       ILocation location)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Moves file or directory to given location.

        This is equivalent to copyFromLocalFile(File, ILocation) followed by deletion of the file, but may be implemented in an optimized way.

        Parameters:
        file - file or directory to copy from
        location - destination location
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if file is null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if file does not exist
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if location is null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if location is relative
        java.io.IOException - if error occurs
        Since:
        3.2.1
